RE_BigJar.Name: strange jar
RE_BigJar.Desc: Transforms an item into a better item. (Potion -> Key -> Artifact -> Active Item -> Unique Equipment)
RE_BigJar.EventDetails:
A strange pot with an invisible inside.
I think I can put something in there.
(Potion -> Key -> Relic -> Active Item -> Unique Equipment)
OrderStrings: I don't think it can be used anymore.

RE_BlackSmith.Name: shabby blacksmith
RE_BlackSmith.Desc: Smelt equipment, relics, and active items to transform them into other items of the same type.
RE_BlackSmith.EventDetails:
It is a forge that is all crumbling down.
The anvil and hammer are rusty, but it looks like they can still be used.
OrderStrings:
The anvil and hammer that ran out of durability were broken.
I don't think it can be used anymore.

RE_Midas.Name: golden statue of miders
RE_Midas.Desc: Convert items to gold up to 1500 gold.
RE_Midas.EventDetails:
The golden statue is shining brilliantly.
Residual Conversion Amount: Forward &aGold

RE_BloodKey.Name: blood bank
RE_BloodKey.Desc: You can get a Key by sacrificing 20 Health. You can obtain up to 2 keys.
UseButtonTooltip: Choose an ally and sacrifice 10 HP.
RE_BloodKey.EventDetails:
A bank that stores blood.
If you donate more stamina to &a, you will be able to get the key.
OrderStrings: Your blood bag is full and you can no longer donate blood.

RE_KeyGarden.Name: garden of keys
RE_KeyGarden.Desc: All allies take a small amount of damage. After that, choose one of the following and get it. (1 key, or 1 skill book + 200 gold)
UseButtonTooltip: Deal 6 damage to all allies, gain a key
Deal 6 damage to all allies, get 1 skill book and 200 gold
RE_KeyGarden.EventDetails:
It is a garden that has not yet been eroded by the Black Mist.
The inside of the garden seems to have a complex structure like a maze.
OrderStrings:
I found the key deep inside the garden.
However, it suffered a small amount of damage from the black mist that followed.

I found a skillbook and gold in a treasure chest near the garden.
However, it suffered a small amount of damage from the black mist that followed.

RE_Medicaltent.Name: medical tent
RE_Medicaltent.Desc: You can choose one of the following: (Reviving allies who are unable to fight / Recovers 100% of HP of 1 ally / Recovers 50% of HP of all allies)
UseButtonTooltip: Heals one ally's moribund state.
Recovers all HP of one ally.
Recovers half of all allies' HP.
RE_Medicaltent.EventDetails:
Abandoned medical facility.
The equipment is very old, but it looks like it can still be used.
OrderStrings: There seems to be nothing more that can be done here.

RE_GoldenOven.Name: golden oven
RE_GoldenOven.Desc: Obtain 2 Bread or consume 3 Bread to obtain 'Golden Bread' 1 piece.
UseButton: Use 3 breads to make golden bread
UseButtonTooltip: Get 2 Breads
Consume 3 Bread to get 1 Golden Bread
RE_GoldenOven.EventDetails:
The golden oven is shining brilliantly.
You can bake delicious bread here.
OrderStrings:
The oven light went out.
I don't think it can be used anymore.

RE_SwordSanctuary.Name: sanctuary of swords
RE_SwordSanctuary.Desc: Instead of acquiring 'Sword of the Forest', the boss of this stage is changed to 'Sir Dortsch'.
UseButtonTooltip: Acquire the 'Forest Sword'. The boss of this stage is changed.
RE_SwordSanctuary.EventDetails:
A sword that shines softly is stuck in the hard rock.
A slab near the sword reads:
“In honor of the heroes of the Dochis who were more valiant than anyone else”
OrderStrings:
As I pulled out my sword, I heard a rustling sound from somewhere.
Is it because of the feeling? It feels like someone is watching.
There is nothing left in the place where the sword was...

RE_FountainOblivion.Name: Fountain of Oblivion
RE_FountainOblivion.Desc: You can forget the Lucy skill 'Acceleration' and acquire something else. (Available only if you have successfully entered 'Blood Park' in the previous round)
RE_FountainOblivion.EventDetails:
In front of you is a wide spring.
An unknown voice is heard from the river.
"what do you want?"
OrderStrings: Lucy's skill 'Acceleration' is lost. Select and learn 1 out of 4 other Lucy Rare Skills.
Lucy's skill 'Acceleration' is lost. Get an Infinite Skillbook and a Celestial.
Lucy's skill 'Acceleration' is lost. Choose one of the 4 artifacts.
Get a Healing Essential Skillbook.
Get one key.
Lucy's skill 'Acceleration' is lost. Get a golden apple.
Lucy's skill 'Acceleration' is lost. Obtained by choosing 1 out of 3 random active items.
Now there is nothing to see here.

No voice is heard from Sam.
*You must enter the Blood Park in the previous round to activate it.

RE_AlchemistHouse.Name: The Alchemist's House
RE_AlchemistHouse.Desc: Obtain 1 Random Potion. Using the key, you can additionally obtain 1 random potion and high-grade equipment.
UseButtonTooltip: Get 1 random potion
RE_AlchemistHouse.EventDetails:
A house that smells of medicinal herbs where an alchemist lived.
It seems to have been left unattended now.
OrderStrings:
The search was successfully completed.
It looks like you got everything you could get here.

I found a potion that looked useful in a dusty place.
If you open the basement door, you can explore even deeper...
go down to the basement
Use the key to get 1 random potion and 1 high-grade gear item

RE_EnchantingTable.Name: enchantment table
RE_EnchantingTable.Desc: Gives random positive enchantments to equipment items. It can be used up to 2 times.
RE_EnchantingTable.EventDetails:
You can grant beneficial enchantments to equipment items.
You can use &a more times.

RE_SacrificeSkill.Name: sacrifice of knowledge
RE_SacrificeSkill.Desc: Select and sacrifice 1 exclusive skill of an ally, and enhance 1 skill.
RE_SacrificeSkill.EventDetails:
A huge book is floating in chains.
The title on the cover of the book is, “The Sacrifice of Knowledge”.
As we got closer, the book began to move slowly, as if it wanted something.
OrderStrings:
The greedy book is still hungry.
You have to sacrifice 1 more skill.

The book begins to unfold, shining brightly as if satisfied.
A mysterious power is felt from the book.
strengthen skills
Sacrifice skill once again
After completing the role, the book returned to its original form.

RE_TrialofTime.Name: the ordeal of time
RE_TrialofTime.Desc: If you clear the battle of this stage boss within the specified time, you will receive an additional reward.
UseButtonTooltip: 20% less time compared to normal
RE_TrialofTime.EventDetails: If you clear the battle of this stage boss within the specified time, you will receive an additional reward.

RE_Gardencemetery.Name: garden cemetery
RE_Gardencemetery.Desc: Obtain 1 Cursed Equipment Item or Lucy's Curse Skill and obtain Gold.
UseButton: Digging the grave of a chaebol
UseButtonTooltip: Acquire 1 Cursed Equipment
Get Lucy Curse skill and get gold
RE_Gardencemetery.EventDetails:
It is an abandoned cemetery with little maintenance.
It seems that something is buried inside the two large tombs.
OrderStrings:
When the tomb was dug, stolen goods appeared with an ominous energy.
I can hear the grim screams of the ghosts...

RE_Invertedcross.Name: inverted cross ornament
RE_Invertedcross.Desc: Applies random negative enchantment to equipment items, and acquires 1 skill book and 200 gold.
UseButtonTooltip: After applying negative enchantment to 1 piece of equipment, obtain 1 skill book and 200 gold
RE_Invertedcross.EventDetails:
Blood drips from the sinister topiary in the shape of an inverted cross.
I think I can put something on the altar.
OrderStrings:
The blood that had fallen from the inverted cross seeped into the equipment.
I think this equipment should be handled with care...

RE_MaidsHouse.Name: maid's house
RE_MaidsHouse.Desc: Battle with elite monsters. When you win, you receive a special reward. (Reward: Skill Book - Healing Stone x2)
RE_MaidsHouse.EventDetails:
This is where the maid dolls live.
Maid dolls are bustling around the house.
OrderStrings:
The maids who lost their heads started to scatter in confusion.
You obtained a reward that looks useful in an empty dorm.

RE_TrialofWisdom.Name: Trial of Wisdom
RE_TrialofWisdom.Desc: I use my deck to test.
RE_TrialofWisdom.EventDetails: A voice is heard from the gravestone. "I will create a deck with the skills of comrades and randomly select 6 skills. The 6 skills can pass trials if they meet the conditions you selected. "
OrderStrings: the sum of the costs is 10 or more
1 or more skills that cost 3 or more
2 or more skills that inflict the Pain debuff
2 or more skills that inflict Weakness and Interference debuffs
2 or more skills that grant buffs
3 or more healing skills
no basic skills

RE_EnforceSkill.Name: reinforced cube
RE_EnforceSkill.Desc: Strengthen 1 ally's skill. However, you must weak another skill with a 50% chance.
UseButton: stand in front of the altar
RE_EnforceSkill.EventDetails:
An unknown device that looks like a cube floats with brilliant colors.
A mysterious energy is felt near the altar.
OrderStrings: touch the statue
The cube began to vibrate with a slight mechanical sound.

It seems that the power of the cube has permeated the skill.
A cube that has finished functioning doesn't seem to work anymore.

RE_EnforceCrystal.Name: witch's vault
RE_EnforceCrystal.Desc: Select an ally's skill and enhance it. Reinforced ally's Max HP is reduced by 4.
UseButtonTooltip: Enhances 1 ally's skill, reduces MAX HP by 4
RE_EnforceCrystal.EventDetails:
A witch's safe with an ominous power.
A powerful force is felt from within.
OrderStrings:
As the skill was strengthened, an unidentified smoke suddenly flowed out from the inside of the safe.
I hurriedly shut my mouth, but it seems it's too late...
I saw something terrible in the safe that I shouldn't have seen...
Reduces the master's max HP by 4
Acquire Lucy Curse Skill

RE_Library.Name: library
RE_Library.Desc: Acquire 1 Skill Book. Also, you can obtain an additional Infinite Skill Book by using Key.
RE_Library.EventDetails:
It is the remains of a ruined library.
Few books remain that can be read completely.
OrderStrings: Use the key to open the door.

When I pulled out the book, an old bookshelf fell like a collapsing, and a hidden door appeared from the back.
If you have the key, you can go even deeper into the library.

I found an undamaged book inside.
The moment I pulled out the book, the library began to shake, and I managed to get out before it collapsed.

RE_PotionCafe.Name: potion cafe
RE_PotionCafe.EventDetails:
It is a potion cafe where various scents are gathered and harmonized.
It seems that several potions are left unattended on the shelves.

RE_KeyVending.Name: key merchant
RE_KeyVending.Desc: You can pay 400 gold to buy 1 key. You can use it up to 2 times.
RE_KeyVending.EventDetails:
You can buy a key for 400 gold. (up to 2)
&a available for purchase

RE_LucyCurseRemover.Name: fountain of purification
RE_LucyCurseRemover.Desc: Remove all Curse of the equipment you are wearing and Lucy's Curse skill. If you succeed in removing even one, you get 200 gold.
UseButtonTooltip: Removes all Curse and Lucy Curse skills from the equipment you are wearing
RE_LucyCurseRemover.EventDetails:
A sacred fountain that can wash away liquids.
I think I can get all the bad energy out of here.
OrderStrings:
When I put my hand in the running water, the curse's energy disappeared like snow.
The fountain ran out of water. I don't think it can be used anymore.

RE_TrialofStrength.Name: trial of strength
RE_TrialofStrength.Desc:
Pay 500 gold and try the ordeal
The higher the damage, the better the rewards.
RE_TrialofStrength.EventDetails:
prove it through trials
Depending on the amount of damage dealt, one of the following rewards can be obtained.
OrderStrings: End

RE_abandonedwarehouse.Name: abandoned warehouse
RE_abandonedwarehouse.Desc: Acquire 3 'Scrap Steel' that can be used in crafting. In addition, by using a key or receiving a curse, you get 2 'Useful Scrap' with a higher grade.
UseButtonTooltip: Get 3 Scrap
RE_abandonedwarehouse.EventDetails:
Abandoned warehouse that smells like rusty iron.
A lot of waste is mixed up and left unattended.
OrderStrings:
I found some scrap metal that I thought could be used, and put it in my bag.
There is still a locked iron door inside the warehouse.
open the door with the key

Inside the door is some scrap metal in better condition.
I picked up the scrap metal until the bag was full.
force the door open
Consumes 1 key, acquires 2 useful scrap metal
Acquire Lucy's curse skill 'Heavy Backpack' and acquire 2 pieces of usable scrap metal

RE_TimeVault.Name: safe of time
RE_TimeVault.Desc: Select 1 item and grant Preservation Function. If the party is annihilated, you can start with the items you saved in the next round. Enchantments or curses are not maintained.
UseButtonTooltip: When annihilated, start with the item in the next round (Enchantment or curse is not maintained)
RE_TimeVault.EventDetails:
It is a safe with a mechanical feel that resembles a clock.
I think you can put your gear in the safe.
OrderStrings:
The equipment has been safely preserved.
When the function is finished, the safe is closed and can no longer be opened.

RE_Souvenirshop.Name: souvenir shop
RE_Souvenirshop.Desc: You can pay 600 gold to purchase the presented active item.
RE_Souvenirshop.EventDetails:
Inside the store, a strange-looking clown greets customers.
The stand shows the prepared items and starts the business.
"Welcome. How about something like this?"
OrderStrings:
The clown pondered for a moment, then pulled out another object and showed it.
"Then how about this one?"

"Thank you for your purchase. Whoops..."
The clown smiled contentedly, took the gold and disappeared.

RE_Casinoroulette.Name: casino roulette
RE_Casinoroulette.Desc: Pay 300 gold and spin roulette to get the winning item.
RE_Casinoroulette.EventDetails:
It is a casino building covered in dazzling neon signs.
The laughter of clowns can be heard from inside.

RE_MagicShow.Name: magic theater
RE_MagicShow.Desc: Select an artifact and turn it into another helpful item.
RE_MagicShow.EventDetails:
Inside the theater, a magician clown is preparing a magic trick.

“Welcome to the magic show!
Show me the artifact, and I'll show you some amazing magic."
OrderStrings:
“Wow, my God! The artifact turned into what you were hoping for in an instant. Whoops... ”
The magician handed the reversed item and disappeared somewhere with black smoke.

RE_BloodFestival.Name: blood lottery
RE_BloodFestival.Desc: Consumes 1 key or has a 50% chance to acquire Lucy's Curse skill and select one of 3 Artifacts to acquire it.
UseButtonTooltip: Consumes 1 key, acquires 1 of 3 artifacts
Acquire one of 3 artifacts, 50% chance to acquire Lucy Curse skill
RE_BloodFestival.EventDetails:
A lottery place for clowns where you can get prizes through a lottery.
As you get closer, the soliciting clown reveals an unpleasant smile.

"Heh, do you want to run a lottery? Then give me a ticket.
what is a ticket? A long, hard stick. It's something that can open anything."
OrderStrings:
I obtained the artifact that came out as a gift.
There doesn't seem to be anything to see here anymore.

"Hey! What are you doing now!?"
I was caught by a clown while trying to get a free gift without a ticket.
She managed to get the prize and barely managed to escape, but somehow things seem to have gotten worse....

RE_BlackMarket.Name: black market
RE_BlackMarket.Desc: You can purchase rare skills or enhancements with soul stones.
UseButton: After checking the rare skill of an investigator, purchase one with 3 soul stones.
After checking Lucy's skill, purchase one with 3 soul stones.
UseButtonTooltip: Soulstones are not consumed even if you check the skill.
Soulstones are not consumed even if you check the skill.
OrderStrings: End

RE_GarbageDump.Name: garbage dump
RE_GarbageDump.Desc: Get a random unique grade equipment item and a Lucy Curse skill, or get 3 random scrolls.
UseButtonTooltip: Random unique grade equipment acquisition, Lucy curse skill 'Banana Peel' acquired
Get 3 random scrolls
OrderStrings: There doesn't seem to be any more to be found here.
